scripts.watch: npx concurrently "npx sass dictionary-app/sass/main.scss dictionary-app/css/styles.css --watch" "npx live-server dictionary-app"
scripts.build: npm run sass:build && powershell -NoProfile -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force dist | Out-Null; Copy-Item -Recurse -Force dictionary-app\* dist"
